scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.kill:port4000: node -e "const {exec} = require('child_process'); exec('netstat -ano | findstr :4000', (e,o) => {if(o){const pid = o.match(/\s+(\d+)$/m)?.[1]; if(pid) {exec(`taskkill /PID ${pid} /F`, (e,o)=>console.log(o||'Killed'));}}else{console.log('No process on port 4000')}})"
